title: Remote skin cancer diagnosis: A comparison of the Waikato District Health Board's Suspected Skin Cancer pathway in 2020 with the Virtual Lesion Clinic in 2020 and …
abstract: Background Teledermatology is a method of skin assessment that allows a larger proportion of people to have dermatologist review. The Suspected Skin Cancer (SSC) electronic referral pathway was introduced at Waikato District Health Board …

title: The metabolic program of inflammatory eosinophils accounts for chronic parasite-induced skin-disease
details: D Barinberg, H Sebald, T Gold, B Rai, D Radtke… - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: Eosinophils exert antimicrobial, cytotoxic and immunoregulatory effects, but their function in cutaneous tissue still remains poorly understood. Here, we used a mouse model of chronic cutaneous leishmaniasis caused by the protozoan parasite …
